People were complaining about the sleeves being too long but I dont think so! They are perfect. I decided to order one size bigger and Im glad I did! It fits and is just a little snug! Purchased for my granddaughter for Christmas, this coat is adorable and well made for a not too expensive price. HOWEVER, you really have to watch the sizing. I thought I'd ordered the right size and it was perfect in every way (hem and sleeve length, shoulder fit, etc.) but the waist was way disproportionate and the coat couldn't even be zipped up.  I was going to reorder two sizes up, but it wouldn't be arriving until February. Then I found another Amazon seller who had the same one (for $10 more) and I could get the size I wanted. BEWARE! This second coat was nothing like the first one. Poor quality, flimsy fabric and sizing? Unbelievable. Not only was the waist area (barely) bigger, the coat now dragged on the floor and the sleeves were about 6 inches too long.  So the first coat would have gotten five stars but for the sizing, while the second coat would get zero if I had that choice.

评论概述: Great Adjustments with a Double Zipper
评论详情: I really liked the double zipper. Normally when zipped up, the bottom of the zipper is just above my knees. Having the second zipper lets me adjust it up to my waist and give my legs more freedom of movement without having to keep the coat open. The collar, when fully zipped up, covers half my face and fits comfortably even with the hood up. Makes me feel like a ninja!  The inside is comfortable and lightly warm too. Probably wouldn't work alone for really cold and snowy conditions (not sure how well it'd do for rain), but for most cold nights or a chilly day it's been great.

This is a very nice quality garment.  The two way zipper is a great feature.  I am 5’ 8” and weigh 150 pounds and I bought a large. The jacket is a good length, below my knees. It is a bit snug around the belly but still looks nice (does not pull strangely).  Also, I have very long arms and this jacket has very long sleeves! I can extend my arm and the sleeve still covers the top of my hand! Yay!

Sent this back. Was not happy with the fit. I’m a little curvey, and this was extremely tight on my hips and large in the upper body. I also wasn’t super happy with what it looked like in person vs the photo.
Love this item . Great quality and high fashion !!!

The sizes are weird, so I'll say this, my shoulders are 20.5 inches and my bust is a 38D - I bought a large, and I can wear a decently thick hoodie underneath it with little issue. I wore it on a relatively wintery day in NYC, it was like 35ºF and gail force winds. The wind cut through this jacket like butter, it was awful. When the wind died down, the jacket was fine, I didnt feel cold and it was comfy. The best feature is that it zips ALL the way up, covers my nose so it was nice that I didn't need a big bulky scarf. Pockets are very shallow, my phone (6in x 3.5 in) kept slipping out. I didn't risk putting my wallet or even my subway card in the pocket. The thumb hooks are pointless if you're wearing gloves, but I did try them out a bit sans gloves and the one on the right side just unraveled, easy sewing fix, but shouldnt have happened on day one. Its cute and I like it, but have to be selective of the day and weather I wear it during.

Love it. I have been looking for something like this for a long time. Did not want a hood but oh well its there. The outter shell is smooth and the inside is fleece like. Very warm. I think the size chart shown runs large. I am 5’3”/36c/118lbs. I ordered a medium. It fits great. Just enough form fitting for nice figure but not tight. With flat shoes barely draggs the floor.

It’s adjustable at the waist but not the bust so make sore you check appropriate bust size. Mine is a bust of 40. So long as you check our size by the company and not amazon, you can’t go wrong. Mine can be worn by itself or with an extra coat but (not too thick), so it fits comfortably underneath and adds a layer of warmth when needed. 评论概述: A bit small but great overall
评论详情: Wish they had in a XXL so it barely fits me but it fits me. Currently dropping weight too so it'll fit better with time

At my age, it's a "bit" more "goth" than I need to be wearing... but I still LOVE it!!! It reminds me of the maxi coat I lived in during the 70s in high school!! I may remove a couple of the metal rings - especially on the sleeve cuffs - to "tamper" down the youthful touches, but in the meantime, they are long enough to roll up once and tuck inside... I did notice thumb holes but they are placed so high, you'd have to have shorter arms than I do (at 5'8") to use them comfortably... Otherwise, I feel SO feminine and flowy in this coat - like out of time and in a romantic period somewhere. It is made of sort of a fleece but not "fluffy" if that makes sense - like a sweatshirt fabric, but thicker/heavier. It is NOT for rain or heavy winter season - but with a skinny cardigan inside, it is warm enough for fall - and COZY!! The shape form-fits so it is EXTREMELY flattering - the ONLY part that is a *bit* off is the hemline is stiff, but I'm hoping that will soften with time/age. I am really loving this coat - It is perfect to wear with maxi sweaters, dresses, or a skinny pair of jeans with tall boots - it is the perfect topping to most any outfit! ...And the lace-up back is DIVINE!!

The fabric is not as soft as you'd hope. The sleeves are super long, with thumb hole. It's a tad small. I can wear it, but not with a thick top. It's nice and LONG. I'm 5'5" 130lbs. I ordered a small. It comes to the ground. I have a tiny waist and it barely zips up with a t shirt on. The hood and collar are very nice! It's constructed well. over all I'm happy with it. I would wash it in downy to make it softer but the tag says dry clean ...

My review is neutral because it's soft and warm. My problem is that THIS IS NOT COAT. I would return it but I can't anymore it. It's unflattering on me because it's not structured and is made out of the same material a sweater would be made of.

评论概述: Take note - ribbon ties for the back are NOT included.
评论详情: This is warm and long and fit well. However, when you pay this much for a coat, you expect all of the parts to come with it. As it stands, I'm going to have to go shopping for ribbon (or something along those lines) because the ties for the back do not come with the coat. That said, the picture and description in this listing are somewhat deceiving. Be aware that you'll only receive part of what's listed/pictured before you purchase.

评论概述: Great coat. Much nicer than expected for the price
评论详情: Very warm comfortable coat. Not “winter in the Midwest” warm, but for a chilly spring or fall evening, it’s great. I live California central coast, where summer nights cool down into the 50s and this is perfect. As other reviewers have said , it is a heavy sweatshirt-like fabric, but not like some cheap sweatshirt from a souvenir shop—this is a really nice quality fabric. I usually wear it open, but it has a nice 2-way zip up the front.  Following the size chart, I wavered between medium and large, but after reading comments from other reviewers I went with large. It’s way too big. I returned it easily for a medium. Even the medium is a bit big-ish but it’s not too bad so think I will keep it. I probably could have been ok with a small for a closer fit. I’m 5’4 and about 108 pounds. Length is all the way to about an inch above the floor. Even a little bit of a heel keeps it nicely off the ground. Very pleased with this purchase.

I was pleasantly surprised by this item. It's a lovely winter jacket that's got that something extra about it re styling whilst not being over the top. I didnt expect the soft inside, so that was a bonus. The arms are long, but I'm okay with that. Can recommend this item.
SO gorgeous! Like a medium-thick sweat shirt material, very warm, very nice! Very happy

This jacket is just sweater material, but I absolutely love it! I live in Texas. It sometimes gets cold here, but for the most part the weather cannot make up its mind. This sweater has extra long arms. It is like this on purpose from what I can tell since there seem to be thumb holes in the sleeves. I can only fit my thumbs through 1 of the thumb holes, the other is too small (and I have a petite bone frame). It is comfortable, and very easy to move around it. I also have a thin knee length jacket that fits underneath this one. When it is really cold, I just layer up and have no problems.  Side note: I have dark brown hair, and really dark sunglasses. When I walk into work wearing this and my glasses, my coworker calls me Trinity.
